abstract: In a brief proceeding in Federal District Court in Lower Manhattan, the hedge fund was arraigned on insider trading charges, making it the first large American company to face an indictment in more than a decade.
snippet: In a brief proceeding in Federal District Court in Lower Manhattan, the hedge fund was arraigned on insider trading charges, making it the first large American company to face an indictment in more than a decade.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:15 p.m. |  After years of winning criminal convictions against employees of SAC Capital Advisors, federal prosecutors on Friday confronted the hedge fund itself.

headline.main: SAC Capital Is Arraigned on a Raft of Criminal Charges
headline.print_headline: In Hedge Fund Case, a Not Guilty Plea and a Gallery of Legal Luminaries
